meanings.definition: Moves through water by moving the limbs
meanings.sent1: The fish swims gracefully in the pond.
meanings.sent2: He swims in the pool every morning for exercise.
meanings.sent3: The rubber duck swims in the bathtub, pretending to be a real duck.
meanings.sent4: Her hair swims in the wind as she runs along the beach.
meanings.sent5: The boat swims through the waves, leaving a trail of foam behind.

meanings.definition: To be immersed in or covered with liquid
meanings.sent1: The shirt accidentally swims in the soapy water.
meanings.sent2: After the rain, the streets swim with puddles.
meanings.sent3: The vegetables swim in the soup, adding flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent4: His mind swims with ideas for the new project.
meanings.sent5: The room swims with the scent of fresh flowers.

meanings.definition: To float on the surface of a liquid
meanings.sent1: The leaf swims on the surface of the pond.
meanings.sent2: The boat swims gently on the calm lake.
meanings.sent3: The bubbles swim on top of the soda, ready to burst.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts swim on the edge of her consciousness, waiting to be remembered.
meanings.sent5: The oil swims on the surface of the water, creating a colorful pattern.
